item.title: Staking SOL on Solana in India: A Guide
item.description: Staking SOL on Solana: A Guide Staking on Solana is a process where you lock up your SOL tokens to support the network’s operations and, in return, earn rewards. While Helius is now the number one validator in Solana, itâ€™s still challenging to stake SOL regularly. To know more about how to stake on Helius, see this blog. Challenges in Staking SOL in India Despite the detailed staking instructions, acquiring Solana in a wallet remains a hurdle in India.
